languages.text: В сумрачной оружейной, без пышных церемоний и досужей публики, украшенный черепом и колонной кинжал был расплавлен и перекован в инквизиторскую инсигнию. Ксавьер Калькасар даровал ее Вольному Торговцу и ввел {mf|его|ее} в Конклав Коронус, братство стражей Империума, поверенных в самые темные тайны Человечества.

In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.
languages.original_text: В сумрачной оружейной, без пышных церемоний и досужей публики, украшенный черепом и колонной кинжал был расплавлен и перекован в инквизиторскую инсигнию. Ксавьер Калькасар даровал ее Вольному Торговцу и ввел {mf|его|ее} в Конклав Коронус, братство стражей Империума, поверенных в самые темные тайны Человечества.

traits.locale_text: In a half-lit Armoury, with no grand ceremony or indolent witnesses, the dagger adorned with a scull and a pillar was melted and reforged into Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a brotherhood of guardians of the Imperium, privy to the darkest secrets of Humanity.

Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a brotherhood of guardians of the Imperium, privy to the darkest secrets of Humanity.

Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a comradeship of guardians of the Imperium privy to humanity's darkest secrets.

Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a comradeship of guardians of the Imperium privy to humanity's darkest secrets.

Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

languages.text: 在昏暗的军械库中，没有盛大的仪式，也没有公开的庆祝。饰有颅骨和支柱的短剑被熔化，重铸成了审判官的玫瑰结。希维尔·卡尔卡扎将玫瑰结授予了行商浪人，正式接受{mf|他|她}加入科罗努斯密会——这个同盟会的所有成员都是帝国的守护者，了解人类最黑暗的秘密。
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: 在昏暗的军械库中，没有盛大的仪式，也没有公开的庆祝。饰有颅骨和支柱的短剑被熔化，重铸成了审判官的玫瑰结。希维尔·卡尔卡扎将玫瑰结授予了行商浪人，正式接受{mf|他|她}加入科罗努斯密会——这个同盟会的所有成员都是帝国的守护者，了解人类最黑暗的秘密。

languages.text: Ohne große Zeremonie oder öffentliches Aufhebens wurde in einer schummrigen Waffenkammer der Dolch mit dem Symbol des Schädels und der Säule eingeschmolzen und es wurden Inquisitor-Insignien daraus geschmiedet. Xavier Calcazar überreichte sie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und nahm {mf|diesen|diese} in die Koronus-Konklave auf, eine Gruppe von Hütern des Imperiums, denen die dunkelsten Geheimnisse der Menschheit bekannt sind.
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: Ohne große Zeremonie oder öffentliches Aufhebens wurde in einer schummrigen Waffenkammer der Dolch mit dem Symbol des Schädels und der Säule eingeschmolzen und es wurden Inquisitor-Insignien daraus geschmiedet. Xavier Calcazar überreichte sie {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und nahm {mf|diesen|diese} in die Koronus-Konklave auf, eine Gruppe von Hütern des Imperiums, denen die dunkelsten Geheimnisse der Menschheit bekannt sind.

languages.text: C'est dans une armurerie mal éclairée, sans cérémonie, que l'on fit fondre la dague ornée d'un crâne et d'un pilier afin d'en faire un insigne d'inquisiteur. Xavier Calcazar la décerna {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et lui octroya un siège dans le Conclave de Koronus, une organisation rassemblant des gardiens de l'Imperium ayant connaissance des secrets les plus sombres de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: C'est dans une armurerie mal éclairée, sans cérémonie, que l'on fit fondre la dague ornée d'un crâne et d'un pilier afin d'en faire un insigne d'inquisiteur. Xavier Calcazar le décerna {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et lui octroya un siège dans le Conclave de Koronus, une organisation rassemblant des gardiens de l'Imperium ayant connaissance des secrets les plus sombres de l'humanité.

languages.text: En una armería con poca iluminación, sin una gran ceremonia ni un público expectante, la daga decorada con la calavera y el pilar se fundió y reforjó en una insignia de Inquisidor. Xavier Calcazar se la otorgó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|le|la} hizo miembro del Cónclave de Koronus, una compañía de guardianes del Imperium al corriente de los secretos más oscuros de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: En una armería, sin una gran ceremonia ni un público expectante, la daga decorada con la calavera y el pilar se fundió y reforjó en una insignia de Inquisidor. Xavier Calcazar se la otorgó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|le|la} hizo miembro del Cónclave de Koronus, una congregación de guardianes del Imperium al corriente de los secretos más oscuros de la Humanidad.

languages.text: 照明が半分落とされた戦団武具庫にて、荘厳な式典や華々しい告示などは行われぬまま、骸骨と柱をあしらった短剣が溶かされて異端審問官の記章が作られた。ザビエル・カルカサルはそれを自由開拓者に与え、{mf|彼|彼女}をコロヌス評議会の一員に迎えた。人類で最も不吉な秘密に通じる、帝国のガーディアンの仲間として。
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: 照明が半分落とされた戦団武具庫にて、荘厳な式典や華々しい告示などは行われぬまま、骸骨と柱をあしらった短剣が溶かされて異端審問官の記章が作られた。ザビエル・カルカサルはそれを自由開拓者に与え、{mf|彼|彼女}をコロヌス評議会の一員に迎えた。人類で最も不吉な秘密に通じる、帝国のガーディアンの仲間として。

languages.text: Loş ışıkla aydınlanmış cephanelikte, büyük bir seremoni veya halka açık bir kutlama olmaksızın kürekle ve sütunla bezeli hançer, eritilip dövülerek bir Engizisyoncu Nişanı'na dönüştürüldü. Xavier Calcazar, nişanı Hür Tacir'e bahşedip onu İmparatorluk'un, İnsanlığın en karanlık sırlarını elinde tutan muhafızlar birliği olan Koronus Meclisi'ne aldı.
languages.original_text: In a half-lit armoury, with no grand ceremony or public fanfare, the dagger adorned with the scull and pillar was melted down and reforged into an Inquisitor Insignia. Xavier Calcazar granted it to the Rogue Trader and inducted {mf|him|her} into the Koronus Conclave, a fellowship of guardians of the Imperium privy to Humanity's darkest secrets.

traits.locale_text: Loş ışıkla aydınlanmış cephanelikte, büyük bir seremoni veya halka açık bir kutlama olmaksızın, kürek ve sütunla bezeli hançer eritildi ve dövülerek bir Engizisyoncu Nişanı hâline getirildi. Xavier Calcazar onu Hür Tacir'e bahşetti ve onu, İmparatorluk'un, İnsanlığın en karanlık sırlarını elinde tutan muhafızlar birliğine, Koronus Meclisi'ne dâhil etti.
